column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Recently , I traveled to Southern California to visit a friend of mine .
#text=It was suggested to me to take the train down south as it is cheaper than driving and flying .
#text=I looked up the available routes and price on the internet and found a ticket for a fairly cheap price .
#text=I purchased it and was very excited at how much money I was saving .
#text=I packed my iPad and made sure all of my electronic items were charged and drove to the train station .
#text=I waited about 30 minutes for the train and carefully boarded it .
#text=I stepped on the to the train that was n't very crowded and found a comfortable window seat next to an old man .
#text=I stared out the window and read a book on my iPad for most of the trip .
#text=When we arrived at the destination , I got off of the train and called my friend to pick me up .
